languages.text: "Ты можешь днями напролет почивать на лаврах, но вместо этого лично разбираешься с проблемами?"
"You could be sitting back reaping the fruits of your own work, so why have you chosen to embrace the vicissitudes of life aboard a voidship?"
languages.original_text: "Ты можешь днями напролет почивать на лаврах, но вместо этого лично разбираешься с проблемами?"

traits.locale_text: "You could be resting on laurels all day but are troubleshooting issues personally instead?"
"You could be resting on laurels all day but are troubleshooting issues personally instead?"
"You could be sitting back reaping the fruits of your own work, so why have you chosen to embrace the vicissitudes of life aboard a voidship?"
"You could be sitting back reaping the fruits of your own work, so why have you chosen to embrace the vicissitudes of life aboard a voidship?"
"You could be sitting back reaping the fruits of your own work, so why have you chosen to embrace the vicissitudes of life aboard a voidship?"

languages.text: “你本可以当个甩手掌柜，坐享其成，可你为什么要踏上虚空舰，过着充满危险的生活？”
languages.original_text: "You could be sitting back reaping the fruits of your own work, so why have you chosen to embrace the vicissitudes of life aboard a voidship?"

traits.locale_text: “你本可以当个甩手掌柜，坐享其成，可你为什么要踏上虚空舰，过着充满危险的生活？”

languages.text: «Podría limitarse a sentarse a recoger los frutos de su trabajo. ¿Por qué ha decidido asumir las vicisitudes de la vida a bordo de una nave del vacío?».
languages.original_text: "You could be sitting back reaping the fruits of your own work, so why have you chosen to embrace the vicissitudes of life aboard a voidship?"

traits.locale_text: «Podría limitarse a sentarse a recoger los frutos de su trabajo. ¿Por qué ha decidido asumir las vicisitudes de la vida a bordo de una nave del vacío?».

languages.text: 「自分の生業を享受することもできたろうに、なぜヴォイドでの波乱に満ちた生活を選んだのだ？」
languages.original_text: "You could be sitting back reaping the fruits of your own work, so why have you chosen to embrace the vicissitudes of life aboard a voidship?"

traits.locale_text: 「自分の生業を享受することもできたろうに、なぜヴォイドでの波乱に満ちた生活を選んだのだ？」

languages.text: "Ihr könntet Euch zurücklehnen und die Früchte Eurer Arbeit genießen. Warum habt Ihr Euch stattdessen für das unbeständige Leben auf einem Raumschiff entschieden?"
languages.original_text: "You could be sitting back reaping the fruits of your own work, so why have you chosen to embrace the vicissitudes of life aboard a voidship?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr könntet Euch zurücklehnen und die Früchte Eurer Arbeit genießen. Warum habt Ihr Euch stattdessen für das unbeständige Leben auf einem Raumschiff entschieden?"

languages.text: « Pourquoi avez-vous choisi cette vie imprévisible à bord d'un vaisseau, alors que vous pourriez vous prélasser tranquillement à Castel en récoltant les fruits de votre labeur ? »
languages.original_text: "You could be sitting back reaping the fruits of your own work, so why have you chosen to embrace the vicissitudes of life aboard a voidship?"

traits.locale_text: « Pourquoi avez-vous choisi cette vie imprévisible à bord d'un vaisseau, alors que vous pourriez vous prélasser tranquillement à Castel en récoltant les fruits de votre labeur ? »

languages.text: "Arkana yaslanıp çalışmalarının meyvelerinin tadını çıkarabilirdin. Bir uçsuz gemisindeki bu inişli çıkışlı hayatı neden tercih ettin?"
languages.original_text: "You could be sitting back reaping the fruits of your own work, so why have you chosen to embrace the vicissitudes of life aboard a voidship?"

traits.locale_text: "Arkana yaslanıp çalışmalarının meyvelerinin tadını çıkarabilirdin. Öyleyse bir uçsuz gemisindeki bu inişli çıkışlı hayatı neden tercih ettin?"
